notes: This dataset contains key figures (topline numbers) on the world's pressing humanitarian crisis as shown on [ReliefWeb's Crises app](http://labs.reliefweb.int/apps.html). The data includes key figures such as the number of affected population and funding status. The data are curated by ReliefWeb's editorial team based on their relevance to the humanitarian community. Descriptions of the files and columns within the files are included in the [Additional Metadata.xlsx file](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/0160cfdf-7dec-41a7-b0d2-8aa378f054d9/resource/7242c23e-bdc6-4411-8f6c-b06cefb742d5/download/Additional-Metadata.xlsx).
